title: Stassi Schroeder reveals sex life with Beau Clarke has taken a dive since engagement
text:
Life has been on the upswing for Stassi Schroeder ever since she accepted a proposal from Beau Clarke over the summer.

But one thing that hasn't been doing so well is their sex life.

The Vanderpump Rules star, 31, revealed on her podcast, Straight Up With Stassi, that she and Beau have been getting less intimate since their engagement.

'We hook up a lot less': Stassi Schroeder revealed on her podcast, Straight Up With Stassi, that she and Beau have been getting less intimate since their engagement

'We hook up a lot less because we're so busy,' she insisted.

And it isn't just wedding planning that has been taking up the bulk of her energy.

'We're so busy working together because we're doing the podcast tour and planning a wedding,' Stassi explained. 'And then in between still filming Vanderpump Rules and having shoots and things we need to do that I'm like, "Oh my God, I'm so sorry."'

Stassi said the lack of intimacy has been a 'negative,' however overall the engagement has added an 'extra layer of safety' to their relationship.

Summer loving: Stassi and her Beau cuddled together during a getaway to Hawaii

'Who gives a s***': Stassi, pictured with Beau June 2019, said arguments are no longer a huge concern now that they are getting married

Now arguments no longer mean the end of the relationship.

'It doesn't even matter because we are getting married so who gives a s***,' she said.

Stassi and Beau became engaged over the summer after a year and a half of dating.

'OMG. I feel like Meghan Markle,' she gushed to her Instagram followers, as she announced the engagement with a photo of her new ring.

Head over heels: Stassi posted a cuddly snap from the night of their engagement

The couple have since revealed they intend to say 'I do' in Rome, Italy.

'We have hired wedding planners and have chosen the location,' Stassi told People. 'It is going to be in Rome, Italy.'

Stassi explained having the wedding abroad was the best way to represent their relationship.

'The thing we love doing the most together is traveling and feel like we spend most of our time in hotels — so we thought it was a good way to capture who we are as a couple,' she said.
description: The Vanderpump Rules star, 31, revealed on her podcast, Straight Up With Stassi, that she and Beau have been getting less intimate since their engagement.
